roleset.name: split into two, split into two - not eventive when refering to breasts
roleset.note: CLEAVE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from cleave.01-v)
CLEAVAGE-N NOTES: Based on ontonotes nouns. Comparison to cleave.01. Cleave.01 is a member of VN class cling-22.5. Framed by Katie. (from cleavage.01-n)

example.name: intransitive, arg1 and arg3
example.text: He heard the words : `` Rock of Ages , cleft [*] for me , [*]Let me hidemyself in Thee ! ! [*] Let the water and the blood From Thy riven side flow ! ! ''

example.name: Splitting of a group
example.text: The pollitcal cleavage of the two ethnic groups resulted in explosive elections
